text: Motjeka Madisha (12 January 1995 â€“ 12 December 2020) was a South African professional soccer player. He played for Mamelodi Sundowns, as a defender. He also played for the national team from 2015 to 2020. Madisha was killed in a car crash on 12 December 2020 in Kempton Park, Guateng at the age of 25. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:South African soccer players
title: Motjeka Madisha
